panels.description: Total blocked request for all clients
panels.title: Total Blocked (all)

panels.description: Cache Hit/Miss ratio. 100 % means, all queries could be answered from the cache, 0% - all queries must be resolved via external DNS
panels.title: Cache Hit/Miss ratio (all)

panels.description: Number of goroutines that currently exist
panels.title: GO Routine

panels.description: Number of threads that currently exist
panels.title: GO Threads

options.content: ×Done!

panels.description: Amount of performed DNS queries to prefetch cached queries for all clients
panels.title: Prefetch count (all)

panels.description: How many of cached entries were prefetched automatically for all clients
panels.title: Prefetch Hit ratio (all)

panels.description: Amount of prefetch queries per minute for all clients
panels.title: Prefetch rate per min (all)

panels.description: Amount of unique domains in the prefetched cache for all clients
panels.title: Prefetch domain count (all)
Request - per response type (5 min window)

targets.expr:
quantile_over_time(
    0.95,
    {app="blocky"} | json | prefix = "queryLog" | client_names =~ "$client" | response_type = "RESOLVED" | unwrap duration_ms | __error__ = "" [1m]
) by (client_names)

quantile_over_time(
    0.95,
    {app="blocky"} | regexp `"response_reason":".*\s+\((?P<upstream>\S+)\)` | json | prefix = "queryLog" | client_names =~ "$client" | response_type = "RESOLVED" | unwrap duration_ms | __error__ = "" [5m]
) by (upstream)

panels.title: Response time - p95 (1m window) per upstream

panels.description: Average query response time for all query types
panels.title: Avg response time

list.description: Blocky URL for REST API calls
list.label: Blocky URL
list.name: blocky_url
